Summary: I observed four star like objects moving in the sky which met and brightened
divs: Sighting DetailsI observed four star like objects moving in the Southeastern sky last night at 10:15pm. The met and formed a boomerang, like shape, which brightened and flashed a few times before dimming, then resumed the light intensity of a star. It continued moving about the southeastern sky. Approx: fifteen minutes later the four objects reformed into a boomerang shap, rebrightened and resumed a bright oragne intense light which flashed. It was followed by a thunder like sound this time, the lights then quickly dimmed and the four star like objects dispursed in a northsouth direction.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brookston
There were no other sightings in Brookston on or around May 21st 2007
